trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around March 31st 1992
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst saw a convoy of them in California,near L.A. on the P.C.H.,think it was April-May 1992.I was driving south-east on the P.C.H. about 20-30 miles out of L.A. proper.Clear day,blue sky, the odd small cloud, early afternoon.Out of the North, so off my left shoulder @ between 10 & 11 o'clock I see maybe a dozen or so of them just hanging there, as I'm driving ~60mph in moderate traffic.All at different elevations, if they were the same size,placed along a narrow,vertical configuration,semi linear.I'm guessing that they were all of the same size, judging by their design.It was impossible to estimate their altitudes ,given my forward motion and the crafts dull white color.The best I can describe them is spherical paddle wheels,two interlocked thin,circular disks,with a + profile,no lights,rotating top paddle to bottom paddle, along the horizontal central axis.All were rotating in phase,at the same angular velocity.Must be some kind of advertisement,I thought.No perceptible wires,no bright colors,no lettering,no lights, no golden arches.I never stopped the truck,I couldn't believe what I'd seen,I was scared shitless,I thought I was nuts,I tried to block it out,I know I'm sane.I want to help your cause.I have extensive research expertise and knowledge.I want to take part in a Canadian contribution,be part of your Canadian affiliate.I want to work for you guys.I'm aware of the impact recent and current events are having on your efforts.I'm aware of the demagoguery,hypocrisy,hidden agendas and blatant corruption of which your country suffers,at the highest levels. I have been watching oil +energy politics for the past twenty years and have studied it's history.I'm aware of the current administrations intent and need to maintain the fossil fuel status quo,their climate changing vested interest.They'd have us all driving SUV's if they could ,while feeding us lies to scare us into war to maintain the status quo.
